features.description: Can store and retrieve user credentials
steps: Call setUserCredentials with token and username
Call getUserCredentials
Verify returned token matches stored token
Verify returned username matches stored username

features.description: Can store and retrieve installation list
steps: Call setInstallations with list of installations
Call getInstallations
Verify returned list contains all stored installations
Verify installation properties are preserved

features.description: Can set and get default installation
steps: Store multiple installations
Call setDefaultInstallation with one installation ID
Call getDefaultInstallation
Verify correct installation ID is returned
Call setCachedInstallationToken with token and expiry
Call getCachedInstallationToken
Verify token is returned if not expired
Verify null is returned if token is expired
Store user credentials and installations
Call clearAllCredentials
Verify getUserCredentials returns null
Verify getInstallations returns empty array
Store user credentials
Verify token is in keychain or encrypted file
Verify token is not in plain text config
